Percentage - a part of a whole, the whole is taken to be
100.
Example:
The percentage of infants who are exclusively
breast-fed from 0-6 months if the total number of
infants is 500 and 100 infants are exclusively
breast-fed from 0-6 months.
Percentage of infants 100
exclusively breast-fed  =
from 0-6 months 500
   = 0.20 or 20%
